definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: grow sharp, Impf. apoc. = juss. [[יׇ֫חַד]] Pr 27:17 a;

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: sharpen (fig.), Impf. apoc. [[יַ֫חַד]] Pr 27:17 b; [[בַּרְזֶל בְּבֶרְזֶל יׇ֑חַד וְאִישׁ יַחְד פְּנֵי־רֵעֵהוּ]] let iron by means of iron grow sharp, and let a man sharpen the countenance (presence, bearing) of his friend;—so Ki:Michl. 126 a De Now Kö:Lgb i, 373 f., cf. Str. (who however makes both forms Hiph.)
